general_advisory: Harvest the matured vegetables & pulses and store in a safe place. Protect the vegetable nursery of Chilli, tomato, onion, cole crops and brinjal etc. from rain by covering with plastic or polythene sheet. Field preparation should be started for rabi crops. Now is the suitable time for sowing mustard, sarson, sunflower, field pea, carrot, radish etc. Pulses like lentil/black gram/green gram can be broadcasted in the standing matured crop (Rice) one week before harvesting to utilize the residual moisture in the soil in suitable areas.

advisory: In early maturing varieties, harvest the crop when 80-85% of the grains are matured. Dry grains to appropriate moisture content.
Apply Emamectin benzoate or Profenophos for American bollworm control.
Apply Streptocycline + Copper Oxychloride for bacterial leaf blight control.
Spray Copper Oxychloride + Plantomycin for grey mildew infestation.
Treat the seed before sowing. Use suitable varieties.
Control leaf webber/leaf folder/defoliators with specified pesticides.
Control pod borer with neem-based pesticides.
Use pheromone traps for borer insect monitoring.
Install blue sticky traps for thrips control.
Spray specified chemicals for thrips management.
Consult veterinary doctors for reproductive issues.
Check animals for dehydration, heat stress, and parasitic infections.
Deworm and vaccinate animals as needed.
Maintain cleanliness in poultry houses by using raised platforms and deep litter systems.
Regularly clean and disinfect the house to prevent pathogen buildup.
Maintain appropriate stocking density to reduce stress and prevent overheating.
